name: Forest Ranger (Minetest-j45)
description:
Forest Ranger

A simple voxel horror game, originally written for MaxParata's voxel horror game jam (https://itch.io/jam/voxel-horror-jam-2021).

Try to get as many points as you can :)

 How to play

If you are playing in itch, full-screen mode is recommended.

Visit http://j1233.minetest.land/forest_ranger/ or download the attached file and open the index.html file

 Controls

W/Up Arrow - move forwards

A/Left Arrow- move left

S/Down Arrow - move backwards

D/Right Arrow - move right

E - shoot

Left Mouse Button + Move Mouse - look around

 Notes

FOG IS RECOMMENDED BUT OFF BY DEFAULT TO SUPPORT OLDER MACHINES

The audio might be automatically blocked by your browser, please unblock it for the extra effect as you can always turn it off via the setting on the main menu.

Tip: dont stay still.

If you want the music to turn back on after you turned it off, or you want to turn the fog off again, refresh the page. BUT NOTE THIS WILL LOSE ANY PROGRESS!

The gun takes 3 seconds to reload.

The middle of crosshair might not actually be where you are shooting, it depends on the screen.

Bullets are where the gun actually hit, some may look low from far away and appear to rise as you get closer but that is just the camera being strange.

Fog is off by default as it can cause lag, to turn it on in game and increase the atmosphere, click "Turn fog on (in game)".

Fun fact: zombies jittering/shaking is on purpose :P

Zombies teleport when they get shot and you get a point.

Zombies get progressively faster as you get more points.

If the zombie teleports close to you, you are a very lucky but dead person.

To kill you, a zombie must be within 50 units of you. Watch out!
